issue.title: [C++] StructArray : cached boxed fields not thread-safe
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5775](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5775). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The lazy initialization isn't thread-safe (it relies neither on a lock nor on an atomic).

Perhaps we need a more general "cached property" facility to handle these cases.
